title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 A1502 (820-4924)
message: Macbook was have small liquid damage near U6200 and U6201 but it was really small and I cleaned with 99% alcohol,no visible damage all clean and silver (like baby butt),The issue is that trackpad and keyboard not working ,power button works only ,and wont turn on if there is no battery ,once turn on you can remove battery still working ok so only to start up need battery installed ,battery charging ok

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 A1502 (820-4924)
message: Does and external keyboard and mouse work? Tried known good trackpad and trackpad flex?

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 A1502 (820-4924)
message: Trackpad fles cable is very common problem or trackpad itself. Trackpad needs to be connected for keyboard to work.

title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 A1502 (820-4924)
message: SOLVED It was flex cable for trackpad
